Commandbutton0.Caption: git init
Commandbutton0.Hint: This command creates an empty Git repository

Commandbutton1.Caption: git status
Commandbutton1.Hint: Returns the status of the working directory and the staging environment

Commandbutton2.Caption: git add - -all
Commandbutton2.Hint: Adds all new or changed files in your working directory to the Git staging area

Commandbutton3.Caption: git commit -a -m 'comment'
Commandbutton3.Hint: Makes a commit and create a message for the commit in one command
